checkHardCapReached(uint256).details: view function to check if the hardcap of the fund is reached
checkHardCapReached(uint256).return: boolean , true or false if the fund has reached its goal or not*

contributeToFund(uint256).details: payable function that allows users to contribute to a fund

params._fundId: unique id to identify the fund in the mapping funds  emits an event with the new balance*

params._benfitiaryAddress: benefitiary address of the fund emits an event with fundId*
params._fundHardCap: hard cap upper limit for the fund

fetchFundDetails(uint256).details: view function to get fund details using unqiue _fundId
fetchFundDetails(uint256).return: name , name of the fundfundHardCap, hard cap upper limit for the fundbalance, current balance fo the fundbenfitiaryAddress benefitiary address of the fund*

fundIdToName(uint256).details: get the name of the fund by using unique fundId

params._fundId: unique id to identify the fund in the mapping funds
